description: The plea claimed there were pages and profiles on social media sites sharing pornographic material without any filter and various OTT platforms were streaming content having potential elements of child pornography.
title: Supreme Court Seeks Response From Government on Sexually Explicit Content on Social Media, OTT Platforms

description: HMD confirmed on Monday that it will launch Direct-to-Mobile (D2M) phones in collaboration with Free Stream Technologies and other D2M partners. The official announcement will be made at the World Audio Visual & Entertainment Summit (WAVES) 2025, which will take place from May 1 to May 4. Lava International, an Indian OEM, will also introduce D2M feature phones in the country.
title: HMD, Lava to Launch Direct-to-Mobile Phones in Partnership With Tejas Networks, FreeStream

description: Huawei is preparing to unveil the Huawei Watch 5 and Watch Fit 4 Series. Just weeks ahead of the formal reveal, alleged renders, pricing and specifications of the Huawei Watch 5 and Watch Fit 4 have leaked online. Here's everything you need to know about Huawei's upcoming wearables.
title: Huawei Watch 5, Watch Fit 4 Series Design, Pricing and Specifications Leaked via Retail Website

description: Bitget and Avalanche have joined forces to contribute to India’s web3 infrastructure. As part of the partnership, the companies plan on initiating awareness campaigns and educational workshops on crypto safety and blockchain exploration throughout the year as part of the “HODL ON” tours.
title: Bitget, Avalanche Announce Partnership to Boost Web3 Adoption in India

description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, the new turn-based RPG from Sandfall Interactive, has sold one million copies in three days of launch. Publisher Kepler Interactive confirmed the milestone in an X post on Sunday, marking a phenomenal achievement for the new IP. Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has also become the highest rated game of 2025.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Sells 1 Million Copies in 3 Days, Becomes Highest Rated Game of 2025

description: CMF Buds 2a, CMF Buds 2 and CMF Buds 2 Plus TWS earphones have been launched in India. They support up to 50dB of active noise cancellation (ANC) and are claimed to offer a total battery life of more than 61 hours, together with their respective cases. The new headsets are compatible with the Nothing X app and support dual-device connectivity.
title: CMF Buds 2a, Buds 2 and Buds 2 Plus With Up to 14 Hours Battery Life Launched in India: Price, Features

description: The CMF Phone 2 Pro comes with a sleek and premium design language. The handset is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro processor and offers a 6.7-inch Full HD+ flexible AMOLED display. The handset comes loaded with a triple-camera setup with a combination of a 50-megapixel primary sensor, a 50-megapixel telephoto lens, and an 8-megapixel ultra-wide-angle lens. The device also features a 16-megapixel shooter for selfies and video calling. The device is loaded with a 5,000mAh battery and offers 33W fast charging support.
title: CMF Phone 2 Pro First Impressions

description: CMF Phone 2 Pro has been launched in India on Monday as a follow-up to last year's CMF Phone 1. The latest handset released by Nothing under its CMF sub-brand comes in four colour options with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset under the hood. The CMF Phone 2 Pro features a 6.77-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz adaptive refresh rate and flaunts a triple rear camera unit headlined by a 50-megapixel main sensor.
title: CMF Phone 2 Pro With MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro SoC, Triple Rear Cameras Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Google Chrome's general manager Parisa Tabriz testified before a Washington federal court on Friday as part of the Justice Department’s antitrust case that accuses Google of monopolising the web search market. Tabriz told the court that Google is the only company that can offer the level of features and functionality that its popular Chrome web browser has today.
title: Only Google Can Run Chrome, Company’s Browser Chief Tells Judge

description: OpenAI updated the GPT-4o artificial intelligence (AI) model on Saturday. The update was aimed at improving the intelligence and personality aspects of the large language model (LLM), which powers the default experience for those on the free tier of ChatGPT. However, on Sunday, the company found that the update had unexpected results, and the AI model’s responses became too agreeable.
title: OpenAI Updates GPT-4o to Boost Intelligence and Personality, Faces Unexpected Side Effects

description: सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने इसे एक 'महत्वपूर्ण चिंता' बताया और इस पर बैन लगाने से जुड़ी याचिका को लेकर केंद्र सरकार और अन्यों से जवाब मांगा है। जस्टिस B R Gavai और Augustine George Masih की बेंच ने कहा कि इस समस्या से निपटने के लिए उपाय लागू करना विधानमंडल या कार्यकारिणी की जिम्मेदारी है। बेंच का कहना था कि यह सुप्रीम कोर्ट के अधिकार क्षेत्र के अंदर नहीं है।
title: Supreme Court Seeks Response From Government on Sexually Explicit Content on Social Media, OTT Platforms

description: Tesla is refunding the years-old bookings since the older generation of the Model 3 is being discontinued. The move suggests a clearing of the decks before new models are officially launched in India, following years of hesitation due to high import duties.
title: Tesla Refunds Early India Bookings Signaling Entry Is Near

description: Google Photos has a hidden shortcut that allows users to switch to the classic search experience from Ask Photos-driven search. Ask Photos was first unveiled at Google I/O last year and started rolling out to users in September 2024. The artificial intelligence (AI) feature allows users to make natural language queries to find relevant images from their images and videos stored in their Google Drive.
title: Google Photos Has a Hidden Shortcut That Switches from Ask Photos to Classic Search

description: Muthayya is set to stream on ETV Win, a Telugu-originated film, on May 1, 2025. The movie has been awarded the best film at the 28th Kolkata International Film Festival and the Jury Award at the Indic Film Utsav 2022. It’s an inspiring story which leaves the message to the audience that it's never too late to dream.
title: Muthayya OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: OnePlus Ace 5 Pro and OnePlus Ace 5 smartphones with Snapdragon chipsets arrived last year. Now, OnePlus seems to be gearing up to announce the new OnePlus Ace 5 Racing Edition and Ace 5 Supreme Edition under the Ace 5 series. Ahead of the official reveal, a Chinese tipster suggested their chipset details. They are said to run on MediaTek Dimensity chipsets.
title: OnePlus Ace 5 Racing Edition Tipped to Feature MediaTek Dimensity 9400e; Could Outperform Snapdragon 8 Gen 3

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge variant was initially announced at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January, and its design was revealed in March. The anticipated smartphone is expected to have the slimmest body among the existing Galaxy S25 lineup models. A new leak has hinted at the build and camera details of the Galaxy S25 Edge phone.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Said to Be Equipped With Titanium Bezel, Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 Protection

description: SanDisk has launched the WD Black SN7100 NVMe SSD (solid-state drive) in India. Similar to other SSDs in the company’s WD Black lineup, the SN7100 model is aimed at mainstream gamers and for tackling AI applications, and comes with support for PCIe Gen4 interface. It is claimed to deliver quick read and write speeds for immersive visuals in games and reduce in-game stutter.
title: SanDisk WD Black SN7100 NVMe SSD With 7.2GBps Read Speeds Launched in India

description: In its “Asia Crypto Security” report, Binance highlighted some crucial patterns observed in the Asian crypto market. Its report has highlighted that the demand for advanced security measures is intensifying in Asia’s crypto markets – where investors are cautious and frequent in their engagements with volatile crypto assets.
title: South Asian Crypto Investors are Cautious, Demand Advanced Crypto Awareness, Survey Shows

description: Enjoy the transition of emotions from lighthearted to heavy ones by watching Thangamagan on Sun NXT. Dhanush and Samantha Starrer this movie is a best flow of love and emotions from a young love to a mature love stage. The movie is directed and written by the famous R. Velraj.
title: Thangamagan Now Available for Streaming on Sun NXT: What You Need to Know

description: Untold: The Liver King is set to premiere on Netflix on May 13, 2025. Directed by Joe Pearlman, the documentary sheds light on the man behind the viral persona, uncovering Brian Johnson’s journey, controversies, and the realities of chasing fame through extreme living.
title: Untold: The Liver King OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch The Raw Story Behind Brian Johnson’s Wild Rise Online?

description: Asus will introduce new ROG Strix gaming laptops in India early next month. The company has announced the date when pre-bookings for the upcoming devices will begin in the country. The teaser reveals that the laptops will be equipped with Nvidia GeForce RTX 5000 series GPUs, which include RTX 5090, RTX 5080, RTX 5070 Ti, and RTX 5070.
title: Asus ROG Strix Laptops With RTX 5000 Series GPU to Launch in India on May 2

description: Google reportedly pays an “enormous sum of money” to Samsung to preinstall the Gemini app. As per the report, the Mountain View-based tech giant began paying the South Korean tech giant in January. The information was said to be revealed by a Google executive while testifying in the ongoing antitrust case against the US Justice Department.
title: Google Reportedly Pays an ‘Enormous Sum of Money’ to Preinstall the Gemini App on Samsung Devices

description: A new report has suggested the launch and availability timeline of the purported Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7 smartphones. The book-style foldable Galaxy Z Fold 7 is tipped to be considerably thinner and is expected to be more costly than the existing Galaxy Z Fold 6. The clamshell foldable Galaxy Z Flip 7 will likely pack a bigger battery than the current Galaxy Z Flip 6.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Launch Timeline Leaked; Said to be Thinner Than Existing Models

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) on Monday expanded the availability of its 5G services to two more cities in India. Previously limited to the Mumbai circle where a majority of users are said to be enjoying high-speed internet with select prepaid and postpaid plans, the telecom operator has introduced its 5G network in Chandigarh and Patna in partnership with Samsung. It is leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) for network optimisation. Vi says it plans to expand the 5G network to more major cities next month.
title: Vodafone Idea Brings 5G Services to Chandigarh and Patna; Delhi, Bengaluru Expansion to Follow Next Month

description: Huawei is preparing to test its newest and most powerful AI processor, hoping to replace some higher-end products of Nvidia. The Chinese company hopes that the latest iteration of its Ascend AI processors will be more powerful than Nvidia's H100, and is slated to receive the first batch of samples of the processor as early as late May, the report added.
title: China's Huawei Develops New AI Chip, Seeking to Match Nvidia, WSJ Reports

description: Microsoft unveiled three new artificial intelligence (AI) features for Copilot+ PCs on Friday. These new features are part of the company’s preview update for April 2025, with a plan to be rolled out to all users next month. Among them, the Redmond-based tech giant is finally rolling out Recall, an AI feature that takes periodic screenshots of the device to help users recall what they were doing during their last session.
title: Microsoft Recall Finally Rolls Out to Copilot+ PCs; New AI-Powered Productivity Tools Announced

description: US SEC Chair, Paul Atkins has said that the crypto sector deserves clear regulatory rules. He spoked at the SEC's crypto roundtable, which the Republican leadership launched to weigh how securities laws may apply to digital assets.
title: New US SEC Chair Says Crypto Sector Deserves Clear Regulations

description: OnePlus 13s is confirmed to launch in India soon. OnePlus shared the first official teaser of the new OnePlus 13 series phone on Monday. The teasers reveal the design, colour options and key specifications of the OnePlus 13s. It will be released in at least two colour options with a compact form factor. The OnePlus 13s appears to debut as a rebranded version of the OnePlus 13T.
title: OnePlus 13s With 6.32-Inch Display Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Design, Colourways Revealed

description: After the launch of the Oppo Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro, a new leak has revealed parts of the next Reno model, tagged as the Oppo Reno 14. The new design does appear very familiar to recent Apple iPhone models but also similar to the older Reno 13. A previous leak suggested that phones would get a metal middle frame and a lightweight build.
title: Oppo Reno 14 Cameras, Button Layout Spotted in Leaked Images That Hint at iPhone-Inspired Design

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge was announced at the Galaxy Unpacked event earlier this year as the newest addition to the Galaxy S25 lineup but the thin phone is yet to see the light of day. With a launch speculated to take place in May, leaks and rumours about the purported handset have shed light on its design and features. A new hands-on video of the Galaxy S25 Edge’s dummy unit on social media suggests it may have a similar form factor as the iPhone 16 Plus.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge’s Dummy Unit Surfaces in Hands-On Video; Size Comparable to iPhone 16 Plus

description: Apps developed by India-based developers were downloaded more than 75.5 crore times on Apple devices via the App Store’s 175 global storefronts in 2024. This resulted in the Cupertino-based tech giant’s ecosystem facilitating Rs. 44,447 crore in developer billings and sales in the same period, according to a recently published study. A 94 percent share of this revenue was accrued solely to developers and businesses, without any commission paid to Apple.
title: Apple's App Store Drove Rs. 44,447 Crore in Sales for India-Based Developers in 2024,  Study Shows

description: The overall crypto market cap rose by 0.21 percent in the last 24 hours. While BTC logged minor gains, ETH settled with small losses. The movement of the altcoins indicate at prevailing volatility, however, analysts say the market sentiment is bullish.
title: Bitcoin Price Rises Past $94,000 as Whales, Institutions Continue Aggressive Acquisition

description: OpenAI is expanding its artificial intelligence (AI) agent Deep Research to the free users of ChatGPT. Announced on Friday, the San Francisco-based AI firm is now offering a “lightweight” version of the tool to all users, including paid subscribers. This version of Deep Research will be powered by the o4-mini AI model and will be available with specific rate limits.
title: ChatGPT Now Offers a ‘Lightweight’ Version of Deep Research to All Users

description: Qualcomm unveiled its Snapdragon 8 Elite mobile SoC in October last year, and many OEMs (original equipment manufacturers) have already released flagship phones with the new chipset. We are now hearing an early rumour about the launch timeline of Qualcomm's next-generation flagship mobile platform — Snapdragon 8 Elite 2. It will debut as a successor to the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Launch Timeline Leaked; Next-Gen Flagship Phones Tipped to Arrive in October

description: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered has crossed four million players, Bethesda has confirmed. The remastered version of the 2006 RPG reached the milestone in just four days of release. Oblivion Remastered was announced and launched simultaneously across PC, PS5 and Xbox Series S/X on April 22.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Has Crossed 4 Million Players; 200,000 Players on Steam

description: Alogic launched its Clarity range of monitors in India late last year. The lineup consists of 4K monitors that feature premium design and plenty of features. The Clarity 27 offers a 4K resolution IPS panel with HDR, an unique design that resembles the Apple Studio Display, excellent adjustability, and plenty of connectivity options. The monitor is priced at Rs. 59,990 in India, but is it worth the price?
title: Alogic Clarity 27 4K Monitor Review: Excellent Design, Great Performance

description: Apple is reportedly developing smart glasses resembling regular spectacles, according to reports. This follows the company's June 2023 launch of the high-end Apple Vision Pro headset, priced at $3,499 (roughly Rs. 2,98,600). The upcoming wearable is anticipated to be similar to Meta's Project Orion or the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses, which retail for up to $379 (roughly Rs. 32,000).
title: Apple Smart Glasses Codename Leaked; Said to Arrive With Support for Apple Intelligence

description: Prime Video is now steaming Crazxy, starring Sohum Shah. This particular thriller follows the storyline of Dr Abhimanyu Sood, a Surgeon who is caught between a terrifying dilemma of saving his daughter or upholding his morals. He faces a life terrifying challenge. Girish Kohli directs it. The movie balances emotions, intensity, and suspense to keep the viewers hooked
title: Crazxy Now Available for Streaming on Prime Video: Everything You need to Know About Sohum Shah's Starrer Movie

description: Good Bad Ugly covers the story of AK, the gangster called The Red Dragon, who decides to leave crime and surrender to the police to lead an everyday life with his family later. After 18 years, the assassins catch him, forcing him to return to his old ways to protect his family. The Tamil action film is now ready to release on Netflix on 8th May 2025
title: Good Bad Ugly OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Ajith Kumar and Trisha Krishna Starrer Movie?

description: Google announced last week that it is planning to bring Gemini to devices such as tablets, smartwatches, headphones, and Android-powered in-car infotainment systems. The Mountain View-based tech giant said that it is currently working on replacing Google Assistant with Gemini on mobile devices, and the focus on other form factors will begin after the AI-powered voice assistant has been made available on compatible smartphones.
title: Google's Gemini AI Will Come to Tablets, Smartwatches and Replace Google Assistant on Older Devices

description: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro will likely be unveiled soon. While we await an official announcement, the upcoming handsets have surfaced on China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT) website. The listing reveals the model numbers of the Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro. Additionally, European pricing, colour options and RAM and storage details of the vanilla Honor 400 have leaked on the Web.
title: Honor 400 Price Leaked; Spotted Alongside Honor 400 Pro on Chinese Certification Website

description: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ is rumoured to be in development as the latest addition to the iQOO Neo 10 Pro series in China. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a tipster has leaked specifications of the purported smartphone. It is tipped to be powered by the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and may come with a 2K resolution display. Meanwhile, the purported iQOO Neo 10 is reported to have received the SDPPI certification which hints at its imminent launch in Indonesia.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Pro+ Specifications Leak Ahead of China Debut; iQOO Neo 10 Reportedly Bags SDPPI Certification

description: Realme GT 7 debuted in China last week and is now said to make its way to the Indian market too. The company has teased its arrival in the country via a microsite while also boasting its gaming prowess. The Realme GT 7 is confirmed to support up to six hours of BGMI gameplay at 120 frames per second (fps).
title: Realme GT 7 India Launch Teased; Confirmed to Deliver Up to Six Hours of Stable 120 FPS BGMI Support
